definition: separate meals/to eat individual meals (rather than taking one's food from plates served to everyone at the table)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Consumers may not accept it due to this.
sentences.chinese: 因此這一點，分餐制可能不爲消費者接受。

sentences.english: Occidentals put intopractice Individual Dining System.
sentences.chinese: 西方人實行的是“個人分餐制”。

sentences.english: We do not Fencan, because there is no information confirming that the virus can be spread by mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我們不贊成分餐，因爲沒有資料證實病毒能經口傳播。

sentences.english: Occidentals put into practice Individual Dining System.
sentences.chinese: 西方人實行的是“個人分餐制”。

sentences.english: Occidental advocate individualism and independence is strong.
sentences.chinese: 西方人實行的是“個人分餐制”。

definition: serving spoon/centiliter (i.e. 10 ml), abbr. to 勺[shao2]
